name: Platform saddles
description: Build turrets and bases on dinosaurs, I wasn't drunk when I though of this.

name: Paracer platform saddle
description: Equip a Paraceratherium with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Bronto platform saddle
description: Equip a Bronto with this to ride it. You can build structure on the large platform to make a mobile base.

description: Equip a Plesiosaur with this to ride it. You can build structure on the large platform to make a mobile base.
